author: zhoresh
msg: Implement JS data fetch through GadgetHandler

author: marvin
msg: Eliminate dependency on Data::Pageset in sample/tutorial application, falling
back to somewhat more obtuse manual generation of paging links for search

author: dblevins
msg: Added "path" field to AppInfo to match how it is in the 3.2 branch

author: marvin
msg: Change Perl sample/tutorial applications to use a corpus based on a plain text
presentation of the US constitution rather than an HTML presentation, allowing
us to eliminate a dependency on HTML::TreeBuilder.
